temperature.docs:
**float, [templatable](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-templatable)**: Set the value of a internal temperature sensor.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-follow-me-action)*

beeper.docs:
**boolean, [templatable](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-templatable)**: set beep on update. Defaults to `False`

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-follow-me-action)*

follow_me.docs:
This action transmit IR FollowMe command telling the air conditioner a more accurate room temperature value to be used instead of the internal indoor unit sensor.

*See also: [`midea_ac.follow_me` Action](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-follow-me-action)*

display_toggle.docs:
This action toggle ac screen. Works via UART if supported or [Remote Transmitter](https://esphome.io/components/remote_transmitter.html).

*See also: [`midea_ac.display_toggle` Action](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-display-toggle-action)*

swing_step.docs:
This action adjust the louver by one step. [Remote Transmitter](https://esphome.io/components/remote_transmitter.html) required.

*See also: [`midea_ac.swing_step` Action](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-swing-step-action)*

beeper_on.docs:
This action turn on beeper feedback.

*See also: [`midea_ac.beeper_on` Action](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-beeper-on-action)*

beeper_off.docs:
This action turn off beeper feedback.

*See also: [`midea_ac.beeper_off` Action](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-beeper-off-action)*

power_on.docs:
This action turn on power. The mode and preset will be restored to the last state before turned off.

*See also: [`midea_ac.power_on` Action](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-power-on-action)*

power_off.docs:
This action turn off power.

*See also: [`midea_ac.power_off` Action](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-power-off-action)*

power_toggle.docs:
This action toggle the power state. Identical to pressing the power button on the remote control.

*See also: [`midea_ac.power_toggle` Action](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#midea-ac-power-toggle-action)*
